drAbbas.title: Precision. Artistry.

image.alt: Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas - Founder & Lead Aesthetic Physician
image.name: Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas

content: With a Masters in Aesthetic Plastic Surgery completed with distinction, Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas represents the pinnacle of aesthetic medicine in London. His extensive credentials‚Äîincluding MRCGP, MRCSEd, and MBBS‚Äîunderscore a commitment to medical excellence.
Dr Abbas's philosophy: "Making you appear to be your best, not just younger." This patient-centered vision focuses on enhancing your natural features while preserving your unique character.

Through extensive training at world-renowned aesthetic clinics across Europe and the UK, Dr Abbas has refined his expertise in facial anatomy and advanced injection techniques, achieving results that look refreshed, never overdone.

quote.text: True artistry in aesthetic medicine lies not in dramatic transformation, but in subtle enhancement. It's about understanding the intricate anatomy beneath the surface, respecting each patient's natural beauty, and delivering results that restore confidence while preserving individuality.
quote.author: Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas
quote.subtitle: MSc (Distinction) in Aesthetic Plastic Surgery

pshotFeatured.title: The P-Shot
pshotFeatured.subtitle: Advanced PRP therapy designed to enhance male sexual health and performance using your body's natural healing factors.
pshotFeatured.processSubtitle: A simple, safe, and effective three-step process

processSteps.title: Blood Collection
processSteps.description: A small blood sample is taken and processed to extract platelet-rich plasma containing growth factors

processSteps.title: PRP Preparation
processSteps.description: Your blood is centrifuged to concentrate the healing platelets and growth factors

processSteps.title: Precise Injection
processSteps.description: PRP is carefully injected to stimulate tissue regeneration and enhance blood flow

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our treatments

items.question: What sets Dr SNA Clinic apart from other beauty clinics?
items.answer: Dr SNA Clinic stands out through our unique combination of medical excellence and artistic precision. Led by Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas, who holds a Master's degree in Aesthetic Plastic Surgery with Distinction, we're CQC registered and GMC certified. Our clinic uses state-of-the-art equipment, FDA-approved products, and evidence-based techniques. We've treated over 10,000 happy patients with a 98% satisfaction rate.

items.question: Are aesthetic treatments at Dr SNA Clinic safe?
items.answer: Safety is our absolute priority. All treatments are performed by GMC-certified doctors with extensive training in aesthetic medicine. We're fully CQC registered and follow strict medical protocols. We use only FDA and CE-approved products from premium brands like Juvederm, Restylane, and Botox. Every patient undergoes a thorough medical consultation and assessment before treatment.

items.question: Will my treatment look natural or will people notice?
items.answer: Natural-looking results are our signature. We follow the philosophy of 'enhanced, not changed' ‚Äì you'll look like the best, most refreshed version of yourself. Our advanced techniques like the MD Codes‚Ñ¢ method focus on restoring facial balance and harmony rather than creating an 'overdone' appearance. People will notice you look great, rested, and radiant.

items.question: How long do results last and when will I see them?
items.answer: Results vary by treatment type. Anti-wrinkle injections typically show results within 3-7 days, lasting 3-4 months initially. Dermal fillers show immediate results that continue improving over 2-4 weeks, lasting 6-18 months. PRP therapy results appear gradually over 3-6 months as collagen regenerates, lasting 12-18 months. We provide a personalized timeline during your consultation.

items.question: How do I book a consultation and what can I expect?
items.answer: Booking is simple ‚Äì click 'Book Consultation' on our website, call us at 020 7123 4567, or WhatsApp +44 7955 836 986. Your initial consultation (¬£50, redeemable against treatment) lasts 30-45 minutes. Dr Abbas will discuss your concerns, assess your facial anatomy, and explain suitable treatment options. You'll receive a personalized treatment plan with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.
